report.title: Basic Summary of Effects of Modafinil
report.author: Anonymous
report.bodytext: A 200mg dose of Modafinil produces the following effects in me: /n /n - A non-euphoric rush of mental energy that lasts 20-30 minutes /n - Muscular tension: jaw clenching, tightening of the chest /n - Mental silence /n - Anxiety (I an anxious person by nature) /n - Mild anhedonia that lasts up to a day /n /n Modafinil begins to kick-in within 30 minutes and peaks at 80 minutes. /n /n The effects are like Adderall, except without the euphoria. /n /n I a 21 year old male, 150 pounds, have a full tolerance to amphetamines, and am generally hypersensitive to psychoactives.
